Sometimes it is helpful to upload configuration files into your project. Usually this is not necessary as you can edit all configuration files directly in Polarion but sometimes you might want to reuse a configuration of another project without retyping evrything inside of your project again e.g. work item types
  • Open Administration view
  • Open following topic in global configuration: Work Items|Enumerations
  • Download the priority-enum.xml file to your desktop (by using righclick) and open it. What you see is a typical Polarion configuration file
  • Open your project to change administration scope
  • Upload the configuration file to your project using the upload function at the bottom
  • edit the configuration file and remove following two entries
    • highest, lowest
Download, Review and Upload an Example Configuration File
